title: Teacher Notifier App
shortDescription: An app for teachers allowing them to setup their schedule, making the app notifying them before every lesson.
description: An app for teachers allowing them to either bulk import their schedule from PDF, or manually enter it easily via selection or voice assistance. Supports multiple(10+) themes, allows per-lesson notify-before customization. Handles holidays and skips them automatically. Also a feature to let teachers export their schedule as PNG/PDF. Banner ads in bottom for monetization.
reason: Had an idea with a teacher relative who thought it would be great to be notified before every lesson.
